choices: You barely shrunk a few inches for now... (5 Foot 2)
You lost a whole foot and a half! (3 foot 11)
You shrunk to the size of a toddler! (1 foot and a half)
1.content:
Oh great, just what you wanted... a boring 3 month vacation to your Aunt's house with your two annoying cousins Andrea and Samantha. Your parents made you come here because they wanted some alone time and wanted to have a second honeymoon in Hawaii. Unfortunately alone means without you, your cab pulled up to the small two story house as you could see your Aunt Olivia and your cousins outside waiting for you. You sigh as you get out and your Aunt greets you, "Hey Kyle! How you been? hope the fligth was okay!" In her cheerful chipper tone. You nod as you get your bags out and begin to walk inside. Olivia stops you and takes your bags "Please let me get these you rest up and spend some time with your cousins, They've been dying to see you!" She smiles and disappears with your bags.

You try to protest but you see a shadow coming over you, you immediately turn to see Andrea's standing over you smiling. She quickly jabs you in your chest causing you to fall over, you were only 5 foot 5 and you weren't exactly the strongest guy. You fell on your ass and went to get up but she pushed you back down, "uh uh uh... say please." She smirked as she stood over you. You rolled your eyes and said "Please can I get up?" you ask as she took a step back. "Sure!" She leaned down picking you up and pulling you to your feet. You brushed yourself off and Andrea smiled as she looked over at Samantha, "How about a game?" She smiled evilly and Samantha giggled.

A few minutes later you found yourself struggling as Andrea was carrying you and and Samantha was following snickering, you tried to yell but Andrea held your mouth closed. They opened up the basement door and tossed you down the stairs, you rolled and sprained your ankle and winced a bit. the girls giggled and slammed the door as you heard it lock. You got to your feet and ran up the stairs to make sure and surely enough.... they locked you in the basement. You tried to scream but you heard a car start outside and you looked out the basement window. Your Aunt was leaving! You banged on the glass but she couldn't hear you. You tried to open the window but it wouldn't move, there was no other way out and so you just stood there.

A half hour went by and you started to get hungry, you looked around and found a little cabinet which contained a jar that read Jelly. You shrugged and opened it eating a few finger fulls, surprisingly it was delicious! you ended up eating the whole jar and then sat on the floor, you rolled the jar away and leaned back as you felt a small tingling sensation. you felt dizzy and passed out on the floor, but after a while you awoke to the door opening. "Kyle?" You heard Andrea call as she started coming down the stairs.
1.title: The Begining

choices: Andrea was in your Room smiling!?
11.content: You sat up looking around and then you stood feeling light headed still and looked up at the staircase as you could hear Andrea coming down the stairs. You could hear her giant footsteps coming down towards you and in panic you run and hide behind a chair. You crouch down and peak over the arm and see her reach the bottom of the stairs, "Kyle?" she called out looking around for you. Thankfully she never had much of an attention span so she didn't bother to search to hard and she left running up the stairs. You sigh in relief as you feel a little light headed and you fall on your ass. You shake your head trying to get your mind straight as you stand. Surprisingly the chair was about as tall as you! You thought for a minute and realized that it must be one of those big and tall chairs and that's why it was in the basement. You shrug and then make your way upstairs being quiet as you did so. Andrea was sitting down on the floor watching T.V and smiling at her show. You crept to the staircase behind her and quietly went upstairs to you room. You quickly shut and locked the door and made your way to the bed where you sat down and rested. You could feel yourself getting light head and you passed out, you woke up the next day, sun shining in your face as you sat up and looked around.
11.title: Amazoness Andrea

111.content: You sat up and staring at you from across the room was Andrea with a smug look on her face and her arms crossed on her chest. "Andrea? What are you doing in here?" You said as you slowly got off the bed and stood up stretching. Andrea walked towards you and tilted her head to the side popping her hip out a bit. "You think you can just run away from me and hide?" She said, standing face to face with you, though now it was weird because your face was at her chest, right at her boobs. You looked straight up at her and she had a look of confusion on her face as she put her hand on your face and pushed you back on the bed. "Whoa, did you get smaller?" She said grinning and then shaking her head. "Hey would you knock it off!" You said sitting up, "It's impossible to get SMALLER Andrea! You must've gotten taller..." she only dropped her jaw and turned her body to the side so you could see the outline of her body. "Really? You think so!" She said happily, she always took pride in her tall height and grinned at you. "well shrimp, guess that means while you get weaker, I get stronger! But it's okay... " she pulled you up holding you in the air by your arms and planted a huge wet kiss on your lips. "You're still my favorite cousin!" She dropped you to your feet and then walked out of your bedroom, heading to hers. So what are you going to do?
111.title: Surprise Wake up

choices: Samantha goes to measure herself and finds something un-usual
Andrea interrupts your conversation and distracts Samantha with her breakfast
1111.content:
You shrugged off the run in with your cousin and went downstairs to grab some breakfast, unfortunately your other cousin, Samantha, was already here eating a bowl of cereal.
"Where's aunt Olivia?" you asked.
"She's gone out to grab some shopping and stuff" she said between mouthfuls, "Said we'd run out of jelly and cake or something.... Although we got a whole jar of jelly in the cupboard."
You were hardly listening in your half awake daze. Instead you were busy getting milk and cereal. To your dismay you were struggling to get the box of cereal down from one of the shelves. The same cereal your cousin was eating actually.... Maybe she used a chair.
While you were thinking that she noticed you struggling, "Stop being dramatic, it's not that high up you shrimp. Even I could get it." You looked at her with a confused expression, to which she sighed got out of her seat and grabbed the box. She then pushed it into your chest, "So lazy".
"I'm not lazy, I seriously couldn't reach it." You said exasperated.
"Well unless you've shrunk that's not possi-" it was then your cousin noticed she was two inches taller than you. "What the hell?"
"Geez you're having a growth spurt too?" with both cousins bigger than you this wasn't going to be a good summer.
"I don't think so" Samantha replied, "All my clothes fit fine...." It was at this point you realized that your clothes were baggier than usual. But shrinking wasn't possible. Was it?
"Let me go measure myself, hopefully I'm catching up to my monster sized family" Samantha was saying absent-mindedly.
1111.title: Head downstairs to eat breakfast

choices: Andrea bursts in and finds you with the food
Andrea doesn't come in and you eat the jelly
Andrea doesn't come in and you eat a small slice of cake
1112.content:
Something felt off to you with your last interactive with Andrea. Her growing was the only logical explanation but something didn't seem right, something you couldn't quite pick out.
You decided against your better judgment to go see Andrea and see if you could figure this out. You went to her room and found the door open ajar. Through the gap you could see Andrea in the corner near an impressive looking weight set, but she wasn't using the set. She was marking her height on the wall and measuring the line.
"I HAVEN'T GROWN AT ALL!" she exclaimed, clearly very frustrated. You didn't know Andrea cared this much about getting bigger. "I can't wait for my next growth spurt, I need to put grow mom at least.... Hopefully I can outgrow everyone." She said staring at her own body in a body-sized mirror. "First I'm going to kick Kyle's ass for lying to me though." she said to herself.
Hearing this you felt a chill run down your spine and quickly tiptoed away. You had to hide. You decided to go back to the basement. Maybe you could figure out if you had really shrunk while you were hiding.
As you made it into the basement, quietly closing the door behind you, you started walking towards the huge chair.
It seemed even bigger than it did yesterday. You sighed, trying to think about what was going on. You were knocked out of your thoughts however when you kicked the empty jelly jar you left down here.
You'd skipped breakfast so this gave you an idea to keep looking for some more of the stuff. Looking through the shelves you noticed that there were a few of the jelly jars, and behind them there were two white boxes. Opening them you found two huge chocolate cakes! Cake for breakfast couldn't be a bad idea could it? But then again that jelly was delicious. While you were thinking about this you noticed you could hear Andrea moving about near the basement entrance.
1112.title: Go see Andrea again

choices: Andrea visibly shudders a few inches bigger
Andrea has a stomach ache but doesn't grow.... Straight away
11121.content:
Before you could decide what to eat the basement door slammed open and you jerked your head around to find Andrea filling the doorway.
"So here you are, the tiny liar" she said placing her hands on her hips, somehow looking even more intimidating.
"I measured myself just now and I haven't grown an inch" she made her way down the stairs. Each step creaked under her impressive weight. "So that means. You. Lied. To me." each word was a step.
By now she was chest to face with you again, and you were frozen still holding a jar of jelly. She grabbed you by the shirt with both hands and in a spectacle of strength lifted you to her eye level. "I don't like being lied to Kyle" her eyes were burning into you. You raised your hands up, beginning to try and defend yourself for a beating when luckily Andrea noticed the jar of jelly.
"What the hell is this?" She asked, snatching it from your hand and letting you drop to your butt.
Seeing this as a chance to change subject you stammered "It's j-jelly.... It's really good, I ate a whole jar yesterday when you locked me in here. There's loads of it and even some cake" you pointed to the shelf from the floor. Not daring to move.
"Cake? I love cake!" she happily chortle. This was the best idea. Andrea's sweet tooth had saved you. She tore open one of the box to find a huge pre-sliced cake. She took s slice in each hand and started stuffing her face. She'd always had a huge appetite maybe your survival was going to be thanks to her stomach more than anything.
You pulled yourself off the floor as she was reaching into the box for her third slice. You had plans to slowly sneak out of the basement when a few bites into her third slice Andrea let out a gasp and doubled over holding her stomach.
11121.title: Andrea bursts in and finds you with the food

choices: "I don't know but I need to measure myself!"
"I don't know but I think i want to do it again!"
111211.content:
"UUUUGGGH" Andrea moaned.

"Are you alright?" You asked, halting your stealthy escape. From your vantage point behind your cousin all you could see was her wide back and butt. She continued to moan for a few seconds more.

"I think something was wrong with the cake." She finally rasped out. Worried you began to approach her and ask if you should call your aunt or maybe even an ambulance. However as you drew closer you noticed Andrea shivering in a strange way. She began to let out a deep throaty moan as you watched her pulse larger in size. It was as if she was flexing and breathing in at the same time but instead of eventually retracting she was maintaining the size. You took a step back, gasping at the strange sight before you.

Your cousin's tight t shirt began to show stress lines as the fabric was stretching across her back, widening in bursts. Her bra dug into her visibly and by the third pulse there was a twang as her bra strap snapped. Alongside this stitches began popping along the seam of her track-suit pants, as her butt bubbled towards you as well as wider and her thighs claimed more room.

By the fifth pulse the shivering had stopped and Andrea rose to her new height of 6'3. Sweating and panting she turned to look at you, clearly exhausted.

After a moment of silence you finally asked "Are you okay?.... What even just happened?"

Andrea replies:
111211.title: Andrea visibly shudders a few inches bigger

choices: At dinner when she wakes up hungry
When she's woken up before that
111212.content:
"UUGHHH... What was wrong with that cake? URRRrrrppp" Andrea's burp rattled the window of the basement.
"Are you okay?" you asked, backing away from your large cousin. She clutched her stomach with one chocolate covered hand while her other still held the third slice.
"You know I'd kick your ass if this cake wasn't so damn good." she mumbled while finishing off the third slice.
"I don't think you should keep eating that...." You worriedly said. At this Andrea rose back to her full height, towering over you despite being a few feet away.
"I'll eat whatever I want. I'll eat the whole damn cake if I want. Are you gonna stop me?" Her switch in emotion freaked you out a little and you shrank back in fear. "That's what I thought" she smirked smugly, a ripple of pain flashed over her face again. She bent slightly at the waist, placing her hand back on her stomach.
"Get out of here, I'm going to sleep of this stomach ache." You turned and stumbled up the stairs, you could hear her stomping behind you.
The next time you see her is:
111212.title: Andrea has a stomach ache but doesn't grow....

choices: You get caught trying to sneak out
1112121.content:
You hadn't seen Andrea for the rest of the day, which was unusual but not unwelcome. Samantha had kept to herself and your Aunt had been busy around the house. You only began to get worried when you heard your aunt call up for dinner.

"ANDREA! KYLE! DINNERS READY!" You rushed to the stairs hearing this, unfortunately you could hear Andrea rumbling around in her room. "Kyle I've left more than enough lasagna for you and Andrea. Samantha has eaten and I'm going to take her to a friend's house for a slumber party. I'll probably be back late tonight because I'm going to see some friends as well." Descending the stairs you nodded to this. "Okay, we're going to head off now. Make sure you eat enough, you look like you've lost weight" Your aunt said waving. You looked down and saw how baggy your clothes looked now, maybe she had a point.

You waved at your aunt and cousin as they were pulling away, you could make out Samantha making a face at you. You sighed and closed the door. As you were walking to the kitchen you could hear Andrea stomping down the stairs. You found a huge tray of lasagna waiting for you in the kitchen, probably enough for five people even.

You didn't feel too hungry at your new height (5'2, Which you still hadn't noticed) and only scoped out a small piece. As you took a seat in the kitchen Andrea walked into the doorway, bleary eyed and half asleep. You gulped the mouthful of lasagna hard. Andrea looked huge. Bigger than usual. Bigger than this morning. All of her clothes were stretched on her door filling frame. Her top was riding up on her midriff, with a slither of her stomach showing and her trousers were showing part of her ankle.

"I'm starving," she began "OOOHHHHH lasagna!" Her eyes snapped open and she rushed over to the tray, basically ignoring you. You quietly picked away at your lasagna, not wanting to bring up her magnification. You watched as she devoured portion after portion of lasagna at amazing speeds.

She finally pushed her plate away and leaned back after finishing the entirety of the tray. You just stared at her wide eyed. She placed a hand on her visibly expanded stomach. You planned to stay seated until she left so that so that she wouldn't notice the height difference you knew would be there but she wasn't paying much attention to you.

As you were debating sneaking out Andrea suddenly stood up and walked over to the refrigerator. "Where's the milk?" She asked, her head obscured by the fridge door. You weren't sure if she was asking you or if that was rhetorical.

Maybe you could sneak out now? Should you go for it?
1112121.title: At dinner when she wakes up hungry

11121212.content:
"Hey answer the que-" she grabbed you by the scruff of your shirt, dragging you back into the room. "And where we're you going?" It was at this point Andrea realized the size disparity again, this was because your eye level was not at the bottom of her breasts.

"So you got smaller again did you?" She chuckled.

"No, I swear, you're bigger this time. You must be, all of your clothes are super tight and... And look you're taller than the fridge." You stammered.

Andrea had been looking down at her clothes and then up at the fridge that she could now see over. "Maybe you're right this time," she said obviously suspicious "this time you're measuring me and if you're lying, I'm kicking your ass on the spot." At this she loomed over you, smiling sinisterly. She then grabbed a half full gallon on milk and started ushering you upstairs.

Her room was messier than you thought it would be, clothes were scattered all over the place. So were a few dumbbells and the weight set including a rack and barbell you had noticed earlier.

Andrea put down the milk and threw a pencil from her desk at you and stood next to the height chart in the corner of the room. "What are you standing around for shrimp? Come here and tell me if I've grown." She growled at you. You ran over and stretched as much as you could to mark off her height, before you could even finish she jumped eagerly passed you to check her height.

"6'3!" Your eardrums hurt. "YEEES! I'm finally taller than mom!" Andrea shouted punching the air violently. She then turned to you smiling, "Maybe you were right this morning." She wrapped her arm around your head and ruffled your hair.
"I knew you were my favorite for a reason."

When she finally released you she looked thoughtful. " I've never had such a big spurt in one go though.... Maybe that's why I was so hungry earlier. I am a GROWING girl you know." You winced at this, "Wait I better keep loading up the calories, I wanna grow as much as possible. Im going to go eat more of that cake!" She grabbed the milk and ran out of the room cackling, leaving you alone with the height chart.

You looked at the height chart, at the mark Andrea had made this morning. It was 6' on the dot, the same as three or four other lines there. Something was telling you to measure yourself, so you decided to try it. To your dismay you found that you were 5'2! How had you shrunk three inches? That's not normal. There's no way that's possible....

While you were standing there for a few minutes Andrea blasted back into the room, carrying the milk, a plate with two slices of cake, a packet of sandwich chicken slices and a huge bag of protein powder. "Get out of here shrimp, I'm gonna work out, all my muscles feel weird. Like I need to stretch." You weren't going to argue with her and scuttled out of the room as quickly as possible.

So what happens next:
1. The pieces come together in your mind and you figure out what's causing the size changing?

2. Andrea measures herself in the morning (she's bigger and still has cake in her system) and notices your mark on the height chart. She "tortures" (not literally) the truth it off you
11121212.title: You get caught trying to sneak out

111212122.content:
You couldn't sleep that night, tossing and turning in bed. You kept having nightmares, all with the same theme: you shrinking smaller and smaller or Andrea growing humongous and destroying everything. Needless to say you dreaded either of these outcomes.

Throughout the night you could hear movement from Andrea's room as well but thought nothing of it. However unknown to you all the food and cake that Andrea had stuffed herself with was having her desired effect. She was tossing and turning as well, her body stretching and thickening, straining the pajamas she was in. She'd have dreams of growing bigger and taking over the house and making everyone follow her demands. She'd wake up every now and then and swear she could feel her body creeping slowly bigger over her bed.

By the time she woke up in the morning she just assumed she could remember all the snippets of her dreams mashed together and that maybe she hadn't felt herself growing. That was until she got up out of bed and took in the view from a lofty 6'5. Her pajama shorts were wrapped around her like a second skin, straining at the seams while her vest had ridden up; leaving her taunt stomach showing just passed her bellybutton and displaying a huge amount of cleavage.

Andrea was happier than she'd been in a long while, going over to the body-length mirror she began laughing as she couldn't even see her face from the eyes up in the reflection anymore. She went to the height chart and measured herself at 6'5, she liked this new rounded off number and enjoyed the thought of looking down at her mother at breakfast. She looked down over all the height that had been marked off through her years of having the chart. 6'5, 6'3, 6'..... She trailed down the numbers until she stopped at 5'2.

5'2? She'd never marked off her height at 5'2, she'd never even been 5'2 she went straight over it from 5' to 5'3 when she was younger. Samantha never cane into her room, she always complained that it was too messy and tomboyish. Had Kyle measured himself? But he always complained that he was 5'5 and not "that short" whenever you called him and shrimp or made fun of him..... Something he hadn't actually been doing recently..... The cogs in Andrea's brain were slowly turning....

"HE IS SMALLER!" She blurted out loud. She thought he'd been acting weird but just chalked it up to giving in to her overpowering him every year. This changed everything. Why was he smaller?

Andrea was set on going and getting answers when her stomach suddenly let out a roar of hunger. Should she find throw on some clothes, get breakfast and show off to her mother? Or is finding answers more important?
111212122.title: Andrea wants answers

choices: Only her mother is awake so far
Neither are downstairs but pigging out is now the priority
1112121221.content:
Let's be serious, nothing is more important than food. Especially not to a growing Andrea. She quickly grabbed some clothes and started to get dressed. There was a slight problem that she was beginning to notice however, all of her clothes were tight. Even getting out of her pajamas had been a struggle, sliding her shorts over her thicker hips and trying to pry her vest off her wider chest and back was harder than she'd thought it'd be.

Despite it being a struggle Andrea found great pleasure is seeing how her bigger body was taxing her clothes. She cracked a wide smile as she squeezed into a bra, grinning to herself in the mirror as she drank in the sight of her breasts spilling over the bra cups. She decided to find baggy or stretchy clothes to clothe her new, larger frame. Eventually she found a pair of formerly long shorts which were now regular shorts and a vest, zip up hooded sweater combo on top.

She tried to put on a pair of ankle socks and found that her feet had done a lot of growing through the night. The ankle socks just wouldn't stretch passed her heel; after hearing some stitches in the sock pop trying to force them on gave up with them. She instead wore some regular socks that now resembled ankle socks. She didn't bother putting on any shoes as she knew there wouldn't be any to fit her.

Instead she bounced downstairs eager to show off her size and tower her mom and Kyle.
1112121221.title: Show off and eat

choices: Kyle comes down and sits quickly to avoid comparison
Kyle goes into Andrea's room to check his height again
11121212211.content:
Andrea strutted into the kitchen with her head held high, her mother however was making breakfast and hadn't turned to look at her daughter yet, giving her a chance to savor her new size advantage over her. Andrea stepped in closer to her mother and giddily looked over the top of her head, she wasn't just a slightly taller, she was now half a head taller than her mother! Andrea felt like she was going to explode with happiness, until her stomach began cramping as it had done in the basement.

She grabbed her midriff and lent forward slightly, just missing her mother- and then something she never expected happened- she actually pulsed larger. It wasn't much but it was noticeable to her. She felt her back broaden, stretching the fabric and straining her bra, her breasts surged even more out of the cups attempting to hold them in and she felt the shorts inch up her thigh slightly more; with the cuff of the shorts filling with her thicker, muscular thigh. Andrea was momentarily shocked before she stretched up to her new stature and looked down her nose at the top of her mother's head. She began grinning manically until her stomach let out a rumble that shook her to her core. At this her mother jumped, startled by the noise and turned to take in the site of her amazonian daughter.

"A-Andrea... You shouldn't sneak up on me like tha-" Her eyes slowly crawled up her daughters grinning face to her eyes. "My God. When did you spurt up again?". This only made Andrea grin even wider.

"I'm a growing girl mom, who said I ever stopped growing?"Andrea stated proudly, straightening her back and raising her head. Olivia could hear her bra creaking, and noticed the strange combination of clothes her daughter was wearing.

"I was hoping you were done growing," she sighed, "I'm guessing you're going to have to go clothes shopping again, like finding clothes at 6' wasn't hard enough. Well sit down, I was just making breakfast for you and Kyle."

"Okay mom, can you make extra, I'm starving" Andrea said as she took a seat. She hadn't forgotten about her sudden increase in size earlier but for now she needed to eat as much as possible to keep this going.

"Sure honey, but you better go grocery shopping for me when you go out to get clothes!" Olivia replied cheerfully. She was taking Andrea's monstrous size better than she would have expected.

"Well, we'll just see how happy she is when I'm even bigger" Andrea thought, chuckling to herself.
11121212211.title: Only her mother is awake so far

choices: You go shopping and Andrea grows (plus asking about shrinking)
You go shopping and Andrea doesn't have a spurt
111212122111.content:
While smiling to herself Andrea noticed Kyle quickly shuffling into the room, he silently glided into a chair at the other end of the table; keeping as much distance between him and Andrea as possible. It took a few seconds for Andrea to figure out why her cousin was acting so strangely. He didn't want his aunt to notice the size disparity between them. While thinking about this Andrea was staring holes into Kyle, thinking about getting answers out of him.

You on the other hand were trying to not make eye contact with your now even larger cousin, what was up with her? You'd never seen anyone grow so much in such a short amount of time. Maybe it was connected to your shrinking? Your thought were interrupted when your aunt turned around.

"Oh, Kyle, when did you get here? And why is everyone sneaking around this morning?" You shrugged and gave a half-hearted smile. "I'll make you some breakfast.... maybe I'll make extra, if you keep losing weight your parents are going to blame me." She thought out loud while placing a huge plate in front of Andrea. It was only now that Andrea's eye averted from burning holes into you as she practically drooled while pulling the plate closer to her. Just as with last night you watched as Andrea tore into her food. It only took a few minutes for Andrea to demolish the giant plate of food but your aunt had speedily cooked another plate for you.

"Can I have seconds please!" Andrea chimed happily to her mother.

"Wow, sure honey. Just slow down and at least chew your food." Your aunt laughed. You looked down at your plate, piled high with sausage, bacon and eggs and wondered how you'd be able to eat even half of this. You slowly picked at it, eating pieces as Andrea was guzzling orange juice straight from the jug behind her mothers back. She'd finished all the juice by the time her mother had given her an even more overfilled plate of food, which Andrea began working on with just as much intensity as before. Your aunt shook her head, watching her inhale her food. "Slow down, I'm not going to make you thirds. That was the last of the breakfast foods." At this Andrea stopped eating and looked up at her mother with genuine sadness in her eyes, you almost choked on your food stifling a laugh. "Don't look at me like that! I told you you'd have to go grocery shopping, pick up some bigger clothes too. You look like you're going to explode out of what you're wearing... Actually, take Kyle with you, he can grab some clothes too." You almost choked on your food again.

"W-wait, I'm fine with what I've got. I don't need any clothes!" You pleaded with your Aunt.

"Well I don't want you left at home alone, being all lazy. And you two should spend more time together! You're cousins! I'll give you some money so you can buy yourself something nice." Your aunt smiled. At this she went to her purse and pulled out a wad of money, she gave Andrea a handful of it, "Stock up well or you're going to be the one going hungry." She said sternly, giving her a peck on the forehead before turning to you and giving you three $20 notes and a peck on the forehead. "Anyway I've got to go run some errands, so I'll see you both tonight." She added, while walking out of the room.

Your cousin looked grumpy about the decisions that had been reached but went back to inhaling her food at record speeds. You looked back to your own plate and carried on picking at yours. Before you could even finish a quarter of it Andrea reached across the table and yanked your plate over to her, shot you an intimidating look and proceeded to clean your plate off as well. You would have argued but you really had a small appetite after eating that jelly. Maybe it had messed with your stomach. Andrea stood from the table and dropped the dishes in front of you.

"Deal with these." She demanded while walking passed you, "I'm gonna go get some dessert."

You waited until she left the room and put the dishes into the dish washer. As you were leaving to go upstairs you bumped into Andrea as she was leaving the basement, munching on a slice of the chocolate cake. "Get ready to go shopping." She said through her stuffed mouth.
111212122111.title: Kyle comes down and sits quickly to avoid compa...

choices: You slip away to find some clothes in your size
1112121221111.content:
You got ready to go shopping and met Andrea at her car. Andrea was already ahead of you, trying to squeeze her 6'6 frame into the tiny car. You thought she'd be furious struggling to get in, you were surprised to hear her deep laughter echoing from the car. You walked around to the passenger seat and got in, Andrea had pushed the seat all the way but and was still cramped into the seat, there were quiet creaks and strains coming from below her.

"I'm going to her to get a new car soon," Andrea chuckled, "Or I'll just tear out this seat and sit in the back." You looked at her muscles in her legs rippling as she maneuvered into a position she could drive. You'd never seen legs as thick as hers, she'd always had big legs but this growth spurt had caused them to thicken to even more. One of her legs probably outweighed both of yours at this point.

You tried not to look at her through the drive to a huge shopping complex. You followed Andrea around grocery shopping, watching her stack the trolley of food higher and higher. The trolley was overflowing with food by the end of the grocery shopping trip with a heavy emphasis on meat, snacks and dairy products. You wondered how long this would last Andrea and her family, probably not for long you thought dejectedly. Once the food was paid for you helped Andrea carry it back to her car, well you say helped but you watch Andrea carry the bulk of the shopping while you only carried four of the lighter bags.

"Come on shrimp! I want to hurry up and get some clothes!" Andrea demanded, piling the food into the trunk of the car. Andrea slammed the trunk shut as you snatched your hands out of the way just in time. Andrea bounced off giddily, clearly excited to get some bigger clothes; you gloomily trudged behind her, thinking what size of clothes you'd have to get.

As you entered the clothing store you were amazed by how large the store was. Maybe it was the inches you had lost but even the rails of clothes were over your head, increasing the dread you were feeling. "Well Honey I just mean you look the same as when you first came here a few years ago... I swear yesterday you looked older." and you then touched your face, were you younger? Shaking your head as that were impossible you look back to your Aunt. "Are my old clothes still here?" Your Aunt nodded and pointed up to the stairs. "Of course, ummm... in the closet in your room." she stated. You merely nod and then head upstairs. Going into your room you move a chair over to get to the top. Grabbing a box that had your name on it you opened it and removed a shirt, pants, socks, and underwear. Stripping down to your own underwear you begin to try and put on your pants...
1522.title: Waking up Younger!

15221.content: You gasped and stumbled a bit, falling off the chair with a thud. The pants were a perfect fit! Grabbing up some of the other clothes you slipped them on and you went into the bathroom to look at yourself. You were definitely thirteen again! You heard a knock on the door to the bedroom and it slowly opened as someone asked if you were okay. You quickly move out of the bathroom and look directly at....
15221.title: 13 again!?

1523.content: So if you're getting younger, who else is aging differently?
1523.title: Who's affected?
